ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He will send heaven down on you in abundant rain
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: He will send you abundant rain from the sky,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: He will shower upon you torrents from heaven,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: ‘He will send down abundant rain for you from the sky.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: He will send rain to you Midrar,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: He will send down upon you the cloud, pouring down abundance of rain:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and He will loose heaven upon you in torrents
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: He will let loose the sky for you in plenteous rain,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: He will send down abundant rain from the sky for you,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: He will send the heaven upon you copiously;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: He will send for you abundant rains from the sky,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: He will send rain to you in abundance;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: He will send rain to you in abundance;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: He will let loose the sky upon you in abundance
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: He will let loose the sky upon you in torrents.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: He will send [rain from] the sky upon you in [continuing] showers
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [71:11] He will release the heaven, the rain — for they had been deprived of it — for you in torrents, in plenteous showers,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (He will let loose the sky for you in plenteous rain) whenever you need rain. This is because Allah had withheld rain from them for 40 years,
